name: Nocturia The Game
description:
After several incidents of wetting the sheets, Timi, a boy of 4 years old, has learned to coexist
with presences that only he can see. But, unfortunately, his parents do not believe what he
claims to see and only wish that his overactive imagination -something utterly normal at his
age- would stop feeding what they call "simple irrational fears".



In the middle of the night, when his parents decide to go out and leave Timi 's care in charge of
his older teenage sister, he has to experienc a new scary adventure to get to the bathroom,
but this time it will be much more intense than usual. It could even be the last one.



Nocturia is a first-person game that, by placing us at the height of a kid, confronts us with
another level of difficulty, in the middle of darkness and having to overcome surprising events,
with creepy sightings and strange sounds that will get on our nerves.

To accomplish the mission, there will be several elements that will become our best allies.

Poor Timi! If only his parents knew that reality can often surpass imagination...
